Title: Faces of Welsh convicts sent to Australia recreated by AI

Title: Toxicity is a good defense, until it isn't
Description:
Imagine, you’re a toxic toad hanging around South America.
No other animals are gonna mess with you, right? After all, you’re ~toxic~! So if anyone tries to eat you, they’ll be exposed to something called a cardiotonic steroid — and may die of a heart attack.…

Title: Here, together: Images of community from NPR station photographers
Description:
NPR marks World Photography Day with images of everyday moments of gathering from communities across the U.S.
taken by photographers from the network's member stations.

Title: I started one of the largest Tesla clubs in the US. Here's why I believe in Elon Musk and his vision.
Description: This as-told-to essay is based on a conversation with John Stringer, a Bay Area resident who founded Tesla Owners of Silicon Valley.

Title: The under-the-radar number that's a huge red flag for America's job market
Description:
The low unemployment rate is masking a weak job market.
The biggest worry is the shrinking labor force, which could hurt the economy for a long time.

Title: Silent Speak and Spell Gets Its Voice Back
Description:
While talking computers are old hat today, in 1978, a talking toy like the Speak and Spell was the height of novel tech.
[Kevin] found a vintage one, but it didn’t work.

Title: America’s Most Misunderstood Pet Is Tiny and Cheap and Might Die on You Quickly. If Only You Knew Its Real Story.

Title: WATCH: 7 killed, including child, after drones strike residential building in Ukraine

Title: Russia launches largest attack of August on Ukraine after Trump-Zelenskyy meeting
Description: Ukraine's air force reported a major Russian attack on Monday night and into Tuesday morning -- the largest barrage for weeks.

Title: WATCH: Skunk rescued after getting stuck in bowl at skatepark in Pennsylvania
Description: A man used a skateboard attached to a dog leash to lift a skunk to safety after the critter got stuck inside a bowl at a Pennsylvania skatepark.

Title: The End of Niche College Sports
